attributes.title: not good
attributes.review: very bad terrible 0/10 do not get or your phone will lock up freeze and become completely useless. had to spend the last of my stimulus check buying a new phone because this app BROKE my other one. rip.

attributes.title: THIS APP BAD🙀😾😾

attributes.title: This is horrible

I couldn’t believe my eyes and I put bleach on my eyes to make sure this was all happening! And I was true so yeah I almost died from the app thanks a lot

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. There aren’t any instructions on how to use the app so idk how to use it. This app encourages tiktok to be taken down so I do not support this app. I downloaded this app and it gave me erectile dysfunction and then my left big toe fell off. I would not download this app

attributes.title: Awful!

attributes.title: Big orange shrimp
